sourcesContent:
Eventos do Component

Tema: {{evento.tema}}

Local: {{evento.local}}

import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent implements OnInit { public eventos: any; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit() { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('http://localhost:5155/api/evento').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); this.eventos = [ { tema: "Angular 11", local: "Curitiba" }, { tema: "React", local: "Floripa" }, { tema: "Flutter", local: "Rio de Janeiro" }, { tema: "React Native", local: "São Paulo" } ] }; }
